extension_description.message: Password Catcher nudi zaštitu od krađe identiteta.

extension_detailed_description.message:
If you enter your Gmail or Google for Work password into anywhere other than accounts.google.com, you’ll receive an alert, so you can change your password if needed.

Password Catcher also tries to detect fake Google login pages to alert you before you’ve typed in your password. To do so, Password Catcher checks the HTML of each page you visit to see if it’s impersonating a Google login page.

FAQ
-- When will Password Catcher take effect?
Password Catcher will initialize itself the next time you enter your password into accounts.google.com.

-- Does Password Catcher store my password or keystrokes?
No. Password Catcher doesn’t store your password or keystrokes -- instead, it stores a secure thumbnail of your password, which it compares against a thumbnail of your most recent keystrokes within Chrome.

-- Where does Password Catcher send data?
If you are using Password Catcher in a Gmail account, Password Catcher does not send any data from your local computer. If your Google for Work administrator chooses to deploy Password Catcher across your domain, the administrator will receive alerts when Password Catcher triggers.

-- What are Password Catcher's limits?
Password Catcher doesn't protect incognito windows, Chrome Apps, or Chrome Extensions. It also does not protect passwords for non-Google services. Password Catcher only operates inside the Chrome web browser when Javascript is enabled.

-- Where can I find more details?
Visit the full FAQ at LINK_TBD, or you can see the entire open-source codebase at https://github.com/google/password- catcher.

By installing this item, you agree to the Google Terms of Service and Privacy Policy at www.google.com/policies/

initialization_message.message: Da bi Password Catcher mogao funkcionirati, prijavite se na svoj račun.

password_warning_banner_body.message: Vaša zaporka za Gmail upravo je izložena stranici za prijavu izvan Gmaila. Odmah poništite zaporku da biste zaštitili svoj Gmail račun. Provjerite i upotrebljavate li zaporku za Gmail na nekim drugim uslugama jer jedan ugroženi račun može ugroziti sve ostale račune.

phishing_warning_banner_body.message: Izgleda da ova web-lokacija upotrebljava lažnu verziju Googleove stranice za prijavu da bi vam ukrala zaporku, pa je blokirana. Ako želite otvoriti tu web-lokaciju iako razumijete da bi mogla naštetiti vašem računalu, pazite koje podatke unosite.
